definitions.definition: The act of progressing or proceeding.
A group of people or things moving along in an orderly, stately, or solemn manner; a train of persons advancing in order; a retinue.
definitions.example: a procession of mourners; the Lord Mayor's procession

definitions.definition: A number of things happening in sequence (in space or in time).
(in the plural) Litanies said in procession and not kneeling.
To take part in a procession.
(North Carolina and Tennessee) To ascertain, mark, and establish the boundary lines of (lands).
